name: PlanMySite
overview:
PlanMySite.com provides all-inclusive web design and hosting services with many add-on features for small businesses helping them come into being on the Internet with style and professionalism.

PlanMySite is for organizations, which are looking to launch their virtual presence by being placed on the Internet with professional and eye-catching web design, to reflect their business needs and personality, to meet their consumer expectations and to launch the growth of their company.

Comprehensive services by PlanMySite .com range from single-page business cards to complex, multipage corporate websites. To begin work with PlanMySite, there is no need for large amounts of money. Small monthly payments through the contract length make it possible for all-sized companies to start their online presence easy and affordable.
